name: Robert Zlatan Zeba
description: I am a man of one simple dream, I have the ability to make people feel good. I believe every woman has to be well taken care of, treated like a queen and pampared like a little babe coz they are special and useful in the lives of every man. God created man and made woman to be as an assistant to man. I am an easy going, like to be funny sometimes, am nice, dedicated, easy to talk to, caring, hard working, God fearing, spontaneous, sweet, attractive with zest for life Fond of cooking & home decor. Health conscious (natural / organic food habit). Love pets and protect environment.
